nodes.text: The Eye was a roleplaying-game adventure in year five of the Living Force campaign. It was the third adventure in the EndTimes trilogy and was written by Morrie Mullins and Jae Walker.

The heroes learn that Len Markus has gone in search of the Eye of the Sun, a Force-imbued artifact that, when combined with the power of the Darkstaff, will destroy Cularin. They confront him at the Ch'hala Heart Tree and defeat him before his plan succeeds.
